import React, { useState } from 'react'; const PicturesGrid = () => { const pictures = [ '/assets/images/pic (1).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (2).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (3).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (4).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (5).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (6).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (7).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (8).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (9).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (10).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (11).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (12).jpg', '/assets/images/pic (13).jpg', ]; const [selectedPicture, setSelectedPicture] = useState(null); const handleSelectPicture = (picture) => { setSelectedPicture(picture); }; return ( <>
{pictures.map((picture, index) => (
handleSelectPicture(index)} className='picture' key={index} >
))}
{selectedPicture && (
Modal title
...
)} ); }; export default PicturesGrid;
